name: 30-Minute Thai Bell-Pepper & Sausage Stir-Fry with Yogurt-Berry Lassi
step_by_step: Slice sausage into ½ cm coins.
Cut bell pepper, carrot and broccoli into bite-size pieces; dice tomato; slice scallions.
Heat 1 Tbsp oil in wok over high heat, sear sausage 2 min until edges caramelise.
Add carrot, broccoli, bell pepper; toss 3 min.
Splash 1 Tbsp fish sauce + 1 tsp palm sugar; toss another 2 min.
Fold in tomato and half the scallions, cook 1 min, taste and adjust salt.
Blend yogurt with berries for a quick lassi.
